me.adaptive.arp.api

Class DatabaseTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.adaptive.arp.api.APIBean
      • me.adaptive.arp.api.DatabaseTable

  • public class DatabaseTable
extends APIBean
    Represents a data table composed of databaseColumns and databaseRows.
    Since:
    v2.0
